statements: SELECT * FROM CreditLimitManagement;
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit FROM CreditLimitManagement WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM CreditLimitManagement WHERE credit_limit > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, outstanding_balance FROM CreditLimitManagement ORDER BY outstanding_balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id FROM CreditLimitManagement WHERE outstanding_balance < credit_limit;
SELECT * FROM CreditLimitManagement WHERE credit_limit > 5000 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit FROM CreditLimitManagement WHERE outstanding_balance < 1000;
SELECT * FROM CreditLimitManagement WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY credit_limit ASC, outstanding_balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, outstanding_balance FROM CreditLimitManagement WHERE credit_limit BETWEEN 3000 AND 7000;
SELECT MAX(credit_limit) AS max_credit_limit, MIN(outstanding_balance) AS min_outstanding_balance FROM CreditLimitManagement;
SELECT * FROM credit_limits;
SELECT account_id, credit_limit FROM credit_limits WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM outstanding_balances ORDER BY account_id ASC;
SELECT account_id, credit_limit FROM credit_limits WHERE credit_limit < 2000 ORDER BY credit_limit DESC;
SELECT SUM(credit_limit) as total_credit_limit FROM credit_limits;
SELECT * FROM credit_limits WHERE account_id = 1001;
SELECT account_id, credit_limit FROM credit_limits WHERE credit_limit > 5000 ORDER BY credit_limit DESC;
SELECT * FROM outstanding_balances WHERE account_id IN (2001, 2002, 2003) ORDER BY account_id;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM outstanding_balances WHERE balance <= 1000;
SELECT c.account_id, c.credit_limit, o.balance FROM credit_limits c INNER JOIN outstanding_balances o ON c.account_id = o.account_id;
SELECT * FROM CreditLimits;
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit FROM CreditLimits ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit FROM CreditLimits WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT * FROM OutstandingBalances WHERE outstanding_balance < 0;
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit FROM CreditLimits WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM CreditLimits
SELECT * FROM OutstandingBalances
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit FROM CreditLimits
SELECT customer_id, outstanding_balance FROM OutstandingBalances

SELECT CreditLimits.customer_id, CreditLimits.credit_limit, OutstandingBalances.outstanding_balance FROM CreditLimits INNER JOIN OutstandingBalances ON CreditLimits.customer_id = OutstandingBalances.customer_id
SELECT * FROM credit_limits;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, outstanding_balance FROM outstanding_balances ORDER BY outstanding_balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, t.transaction_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, (c.credit_limit - b.outstanding_balance) AS available_credit FROM customers c JOIN credit_limits l ON c.customer_id = l.customer_id JOIN outstanding_balances b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CreditLimits;
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit FROM CreditLimits ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, credit_used, payment_date FROM CreditHistory WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, MAX(amount) AS max_transaction FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT c.customer_name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_spent FROM Customers c JOIN Transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name
SELECT * FROM CreditHistory WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY credit_used DESC
